targets.query:
from(bucket: "qos_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "availability")
  |> group()
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value,
      metric: "System Status"
    }))

from(bucket: "qos_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "latency")
  |> group()
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value,
      metric: "Response Time"
    }))

from(bucket: "qos_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "error_rate")
  |> group()
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value,
      metric: "Error Rate"
    }))

from(bucket: "qos_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "throughput")
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value,
      metric: "Total API Calls"
    }))

from(bucket: "qos_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> group(columns: ["tenant_id"])
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value,
      metric: "Active Tenants"
    }))

from(bucket: "qos_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "availability")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["value"] >= 95.0)
  |> group()
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value,
      metric: "SLA Compliance"
    }))

from(bucket: "qos_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "availability")
  |> group(columns: ["service_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value,
      service: r.service_name,
      availability: r._value
    }))

from(bucket: "qos_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "latency")
  |> group(columns: ["service_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value,
      service: r.service_name,
      response_time: r._value
    }))

from(bucket: "qos_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "error_rate")
  |> group(columns: ["service_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value,
      service: r.service_name,
      error_rate: r._value
    }))

from(bucket: "qos_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "throughput")
  |> group(columns: ["service_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value,
      service: r.service_name,
      throughput: r._value
    }))

from(bucket: "qos_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "availability")
  |> group(columns: ["tenant_id", "sla_tier"])
  |> mean()
  |> sort(columns: ["tenant_id"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      tenant: r.tenant_id,
      sla_tier: r.sla_tier,
      availability: r._value,
      status: if r._value >= 99.0 then "Excellent" else if r._value >= 95.0 then "Good" else "Poor"
    }))

from(bucket: "qos_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "latency")
  |> group(columns: ["service_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value,
      service: r.service_name,
      latency: r._value
    }))

from(bucket: "qos_metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "qos_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["metric_type"] == "error_rate")
  |> group(columns: ["service_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: r._value,
      service: r.service_name,
      error_rate: r._value
    }))
